If you made it here, thank you! I truly hope you find these roundups helpful and valuable to the community! I am always open to suggestions on topics and ways to add more value, personally and via @thehugxyz! 

Very grateful to everyone who took time to respond and give advice!

Great checklist from @straticlear:

1âƒ£ Founders solicit & implement community suggestions.
2âƒ£ Sensible, achievable roadmap.
3âƒ£ Accountability over missteps.
4âƒ£ Meaningful discussions (not just price).
5âƒ£ Community proactively collaborates on making the project more rewarding.

(15) Are the founders active? 

âœ¨ Or do they just punt â€œmanaging the communityâ€ off to the mods?
âœ¨ Are they as supportive to the community as the community is to them? Or did they just set up a mod team so they can chill

@xoxo_cait @lynnwagon @moocowNFT

(14) And inclusive to the whole world, not just the time/language of the team

âœ¨ Are other languages/time zones taken into account? 
âœ¨ Do voice chats happen for accessibility? 
âœ¨ Does the community go beyond Discord to include more ppl?

@sailingcloud @crittie_p @MsCryptoMom1

(13) Is the discussion respectful & inclusive?

âœ¨ Does the community respect all opinions with an open mind? 
âœ¨ Is the vibe positive, uplifting, genuine?
âœ¨Are there clear values of respect & active moderating for violators?

@weepie76 @crittie_p @sailingcloud @womenof_web3

(12) Does it feel like a long term play?

âœ¨ Are they committed to building value over time or do you get short term vibes?
âœ¨ Are the founding team and community cultivating ways to deliver value in a sustainable way for the long term?

@thedreamydryad @marvelgirl_eth

11) Beyond welcomingâ€¦are people helpful? 

âœ¨Do members answer questions & drive discussions?
âœ¨ If anyone asks questions are they ridiculed or do they get genuine help? 

A great community will jump in & assist, give advice/knowledge.

@joshuahenderson @xoxo_cait @mandimiranda

(10) Is the community welcoming to new members or just OGs?

âœ¨ Can new members feel comfortable asking questions/participating? 
âœ¨ Are newcomersâ€™ thoughts and opinions valued too?

You can learn a lot by evaluating the support new members receive!

@LizzieJaneEth @metapixies

(9) Do you LIKE the conversation?

âœ¨ Does seeing how people interact make you want to leave or double down? âœ¨ Are the founders active in the convo?
âœ¨ Is this something you would share with friends and not feel regret?

@DorothyTravel @KanwalZ2 @xoxo_cait @rileybeans_eth

(8) Is there a good, clear, attainable roadmap? 

âœ¨ Is there an active roadmap that excites you?
âœ¨ Is the roadmap unique or just a carbon copy of others?
âœ¨ Are there good partnerships on there?

@jennifercapo @0xErnestN @joana_eth

(7) Does the community purpose matter to you?

âœ¨ Does the project resonate with you, matter & have meaning?
âœ¨ Purpose driven, with clearly articulated values vs hype?
âœ¨ Good ethos & values - what they support & stand behind?

@thedreamydryad @vhsbosslady @chaplainMBA @sbraude

(6) Are people empowered to participate?

âœ¨ Are there meaningful roles for members?
âœ¨ Can members help shape the project with ideas & feedback?
âœ¨ Does the community give real input and contribute with their talent.

@MetawomenNFT2 @powerofwomenNFT @TonkaTri @UnfungibleHer

(5) Does the community support one another in difficult times?

âœ¨ Does the team and community rally around and assist those who have been taken advantage of by bad actors in the space?
âœ¨ Do members help other members?

@G_DAnderson @GirlCodeClubNFT

(4) â€¦And communicates clearly, through good & bad.

âœ¨How do they handle mints gone wrong, FUD, etc?
âœ¨Does the team communicate good AND bad or is everything sunshine & roses?
âœ¨ Do they talk to community as people? Or just grinders/marketers

@thedreamydryad @rainheartwisdom

(3) A strong DOXXED team

âœ¨ Is team anon or open identity?
âœ¨ Do they have experience & vision to propel the project forward?
âœ¨ Do they communicate well/transparently?
âœ¨ Do they hold themselves accountable?

@ange888lover @G_DAnderson @VHSbosslady @dommoreci23 @PuppyMetaverse

(2) â€¦Or is it all just floor price talk? ğŸ¤®

âœ¨ Does convo go beyond WL/flr price?
âœ¨ Real talk or endless GM/WGMI?
âœ¨ Separate channel for floor talk?

I look at the amount of time spend talking about FP... fruit pies ğŸ¤£

@_nickalexander @rainheartwisdom @lorrNFT @cryptopiggyB

(1) Is the Discord a fun, enjoyable place?

âœ¨ Does the community participate in activities like spaces & game nights?
âœ¨ Do ppl get personal with each other and form friendships?

These things connect us in ways that go far beyond NFTs. 

@GirlCodeClub @bbhomebody

Being in crypto is like going to the most wild, fun partyâ€¦and then stumbling out at 2am only to realize youâ€™re in one seriously sketchy neighborhood. Stay safe out there, everyone! https://t.co/xxTJ4pLK32

None of this is an excuse for nastiness on my part. I pride myself on being a cheerleader for women. I know we will come back stronger from this (earning back trust takes time) & when ppl think of women-led projects, theyâ€™ll think of authenticity, integrity & amazing original art

I do feel disappointed in ppl who bought/sold the project today. As soon as it was even a question that it might be stolen IP, seeking returns, buying in low, giving royalties to the project, doesnâ€™t feel right. I hope ALL $ made since the info came to light goes to 1:1 artists.

I think the team showed strong leadership in their recent decision to remove the artist. I truly hope that the team did NOT know what was happening this whole time and my heart goes out to the community that bought into the project (I did too!) For many it was their first NFT.

I deleted a recent tweet b/c it was mean. I donâ€™t want to be a woman that kicks other women when down. Iâ€™m sorry. 

But so many are working tirelessly to show that investing in women-led projects is smart, so itâ€™s a huge gut punch when that feels undermined by our own community.

A toast to everyone building projects with authenticity and integrity. There are no shortcuts when building real value.

âœ¨Build your project on solid foundation
âœ¨treat people fairly
âœ¨ issue real apology when wrong. own. up. 

A few bad actors do NOT define the entire category.
